text: RT @TimTeeman: The LGBTQ win at SCOTUS is also a momentous day for Aimee Stephens, who did not live to see to see it, but whose determination and resolve took the issue of anti-transgender discrimination to the Supreme Court. Her victory is a resounding legacy.  https://t.co/5wv04BCar1

name: thedailybeast
